jml.topics
Class TopicModel

java.lang.Object
  jml.topics.TopicModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
LDA, LSI, RLSI, SparseLSA
public abstract class TopicModel
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract super class for all topic models.

Version:
1.0, Jan 3rd, 2013
Author:
Mingjie Qian
